P003489.project_name: Gansu Provincial Development Project - Agriculture, Education, and Industrial Diversification Components

keywords.cdata: achievement,addition,Adult literacy,age cohort,Age group,Basic Education,boarding,class size,classrooms,Colleges,Compulsory Education,compulsory schooling,continuing education,correspondence courses,curriculum,demonstration,developing countries,development program,economic sectors,education institutions,Education Law,education policy,education policy reforms,education programs,education projects,education system,educational administration,educational administrators,educational development,Educational Management,educational materials,educational needs,educational requirements,Educational Supervision,engineering,Enrollment,enrollment rate,enrollment targets,Financial Constraints,first grade,girls,grading,gross enrollment,gross enrollment ratio,income levels,inservice training,Instruction,Instructional Materials,learning,learning centers,literacy rate,Low Enrollment,Medical Education,National Education,net enrollment,per capita income,Population Growth,Primary Enrollment,primary school,primary school buildings,primary schools,primary students,primary teachers,provincial education,public expenditure,qualified teachers,quality of education,reading,reading materials,repeaters,Repetition,Repetition rates,rural areas,rural schools,School Administration,school attendance,school construction,school education,School Facilities,school furniture,school location,schooling,Science Instruction,secondary education,secondary enrollment,secondary level,secondary school principals,secondary scho

project_abstract.cdata: The Gansu Provincial Development Project consists of three parts: Agriculture, Education, and Industrial Diversification. The Agriculture Component will benefit one of the poorest areas of China where lack of rainfall constrains crop production and farm incomes. The project will complete construction of the Yindaruqin irrigation scheme, covering 57,000 ha, and will resettle on the newly irrigated land about 15,000 farm families from surrounding drought-stricken areas.  It will also include a component to improve rainfed agriculture on some 76,000 ha of the Guanchuan River Basin through soil conservation and improved farming practices.  Main features include completion of the feeder channel and the construction of the network of canals and drains down to the service unit for the irrigation scheme; construction of benches, terraces and gully control structures in the rainfed river basin; and improvement of rural roads and power facilities.  Training will be provided to improve technical skills in irrigation management and agriculture, and consulting services will be engaged for construction supervision. The Education Component supports the government's efforts to achieve universal basic education by the year 2000, and to improve education quality in primary and lower secondary schools in the province, chiefly by increasing numbers, qualifications, and status of teachers. To achieve this, the project will: (1) expand the capacity of five normal colleges for lower secondary school teachers; (2) upgrade the facilities of 23 normal schools for primary teacher training; (3) assist the Gansu TV Education Institute to expand its in-service training program; (4) improve science instruction in poor lower secondary schools; (5) establish a Center for School Administration to train school and government education administrators; and (6) assist continuing the development of a new s

P003489.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>甘肃发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目设有农业、教育和多种经营三个子项目。其中，农业子项目将造福于中国最贫困地区之一的甘肃省，因其境内降水稀少制约了农作物生产和农业收入增加。项目将完成覆盖面积为5.7万公顷的引大入秦灌溉工程建设，把1.5万农户从周围干旱地区搬迁至新开发的灌溉地区。项目也将通过水土保持工作和优良农业实践对关川河流域内7.6万公顷左右雨灌农田进行改造。本子项目主要内容包括：（1）完成供水渠建设，建设下至该灌溉工程所服务单元的各级渠道和排水设施网络；（2）在关川河流域建设梯田和沟壑控制建筑物；（3）改造农村公路和电力设施。项目将提供培训，以提高灌溉管理和农业生产方面的技术能力；也将就施工监理工作提供咨询服务。教育子项目支持甘肃省政府在2000年之前实现普及基础教育目标，提高全省九年义务教育质量，为此采取的主要措施包括增加教师数量以及提高教师素质和地位。为实现这一目标，项目将：（1）扩大五所培养初中教师的师范学院的招生人数；（2）对23所培养小学教师的师范学校的设施进行升级改造；（3）协助甘肃电视教育学院加大在职培训力度；（4）加强贫困地区初级中学的科技教学；（5）建立学校管理中心，培养学校和政府教育管理者；（6）协助进一步完善学校监督制度，按计划改进教育信息管理系统。多种经营子项目的设计初衷是：（1）通过支持农村轻工企业实行技术改造发展多种经营；（2）协助甘肃省信托投资公司发展成为有活力的金融机构；（3）建立地方在投资决策过程中采用经济分析方法及在规划过程中采用行业分析方法的能力；（4）提高地方可持续开展培训的能力。本子项目包括两项内容：（1）提供转贷款，资助农村轻工企业实施中小型项目；（2）就地方实施机构的能力建设工作提供培训和技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
